title: Salt and Pepper Chicken
directions: Combine flour and spices in a bowl.
Cut chicken into 1 cm strips and toss in flour mixture to coat.
Heat frypan and add enough oil to thinly cover base.
Fry chicken over medium-high heat until golden. Just before removing add garlic, chilli and shallots to pan and cook for one minute.
Remove and drain on paper towels. While pan is still hot fry some Asian greens with oyster or hoi sin sauce. Serve with rice.
